## Overview

### The Problem
Consumers and businesses in Kenya lack real-time price intelligence across multiple e-commerce platforms:

- No centralized way to compare prices across Jumia, Kilimall, Masoko
- Hard to track price history and identify the best time to buy
- Missing deals due to lack of price drop alerts
- No data-driven insights on pricing trends

### The Solution

This platform automates price intelligence:

| Component | Technology | Status |
|:---|:---|:---|
| **Multi-Platform Scraping** | Python + BeautifulSoup | âœ… Live |
| **Real-time Tracking** | Automated scrapers | âœ… Live |

| **Deal Detection** | Discount analysis | âœ… Live |
| **Interactive Dashboard** | Streamlit + Plotly | âœ… **Deployed** |

## Running Locally

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/gondamol/ecommerce-price-intelligence.git
cd ecommerce-price-intelligence

# Create virtual environment
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run the scraper
python3 scripts/scrape_prices.py

# Start the dashboard
streamlit run dashboard/app.py
```
